description.description: Defines the description of the RDS cluster parameter group, providing context for its purpose or usage. Maximum length is 255 characters.

family.description: Specifies the database family this parameter group is compatible with; must match the version of the database cluster.

name.description: Name of the RDS cluster parameter group to create or manage; must be unique within the AWS account.

name_prefix.description: Prefix for the name of the RDS cluster parameter group; must be unique and cannot exceed 255 characters.

parameter.description: Defines the parameters for an RDS cluster, specifying database engine settings and configuration values.

tags.description: Key-value pairs to associate with the resource for organization, management, or cost tracking purposes.
